name: Discord Bot Maker
description: Discord Bot Maker is a powerful bot development tool for the #1 text and voice chat service for gamers: Discord. With this tool, you and your teammates can take your social experience to the next level!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 64MB Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 250 MB available space
